title: Is Jungkook in a secret relationship with Eminem? - Quora

response.answer_text: So you’re asking me (an ARMY who knows how to give people their own damn privacy and space) whether Jungkook, a 23 year old Korean man from an insanely popular Kpop group’s dating Eminem, a 48 year old American rapper who also is insanely popular and can rap faster than me running away from my mom when she’s bout to whoop my ass. maybe yes or maybe no, who tf knows or cares bruh go ask one of them. From what I’ve heard or have seen they haven’t publicly met yet which means they are most likely not in a “SecRet rElAtiOnsHip” but still who knows, altho the chances are minusculer than thy brain… hope that helped :)) ~zak

Wtf what the fuck ok im done now normally i would not answer questions and just read them,skip not that it matters or means anything to you but seriously wtf are you joking maybe just curious but if your being serious i dont know what to say i mean shiii i dont mean this in a bad way i dont want to be mean or hateful but just ask yourself are they really in a relationship like just think,process,collect your ig information then boom there's your answer thank you very much have a good day💙
